<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Night's Glow](/Feats.aspx?ID=4067) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064)

</column>

---

The stars and moon lend you their light. You gain your choice of the [_moonbeam_](/Spells.aspx?ID=433) or [_zenith star_](/Spells.aspx?ID=618) domain spell. Like your Oatia skysage spells, you cast this focus spell as an occult spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover by using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) to reflect upon or gaze at the stars.

**Special** You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

<title level="2">Night's Glow leads to...</title>
[Night's Shine](/Feats.aspx?ID=4072)
name: Night's Glow
